name: SUnit Browser
short_description: SUnit Browser is a functional, but simple and reasonably portable, user interface for the SUnit Test Environment for Smalltalk.  These interfaces enhance the usefulness of the SUnit testing platform and facilitate unit and acceptance testing during develo
